name: Prinx Studio Apartments Amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just stayed at Prinx Studio for a week and it was the perfect accomodation for us.
reviews.title: Prinx is the Best

reviews.text: I researched a ton online and finally found what I was looking for. From my initial inquiry, to the arrival instructions, the room overlooking the canal, the room was excellent & clean, the cost, the departure….everything was perfect.
reviews.title: Could not fault it!

reviews.text: The neighborhood is near all of the museums, great restaurants, cafe's, Leidensplien, gallery's, shopping, bike rentals etc. What it's not near should certainly be within walking distance, it's Amsterdam after all.
reviews.title: Excellent in Everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ton & Héctor are great and are very helpful, knowledgable and they run a great, super clean place.
reviews.title: A great stay, great place, great value!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I don't write these referrals as much as I should but this one was a must. I highly recommend Prinx Studio's.
reviews.title: Ideal location. Comfortable

reviews.text: Prinx is in a nice part of Amsterdam, especially if you like museums as it is very close to the Rijksmuseum, Stedelijk, and the currently being renovated Van Gogh Museum (the Van Goghs can be seen at the Hermitage). It is far from the Centrum but the Tram stop is nearby so if you get a day-card/2-day pass, it is easy to explore the entire city. Our host, Ton, was very nice and helpful. He helped us carry our heavy luggage up the steep stairs. We felt bad bothering him about the glitchy wifi internet but he was very attentive and apologetic as they had recently changed providers and have not worked out the kinks in the system yet. Hopefully, it will be fixed soon.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.text: Well, we are total converts to PRINX, this being our fifth visit. Needless to say, location, styling, privacy, communication with the owners - are the most ideal aspects of the studios. Impeccably clean, well serviced and comfortable beds in a spacious and historic home on a canal in Amsterdam -what more could you ask! But seriously, if you are a new ex-pat waiting to settle this is a great location. For all, transit proximity is ideal in any direction - you are only one block away from the 10, the ring tram that takes you to the Heinikein, the Albert Cuyp, the Botanical Gardens, to name a few. The Leidsplein is within walking distance, as are endless club, restaurants and shopping. You are safe and secure, knowing any problem can be managed with accessible onsite owners. WI FI is super fast. Settle in and stay a few days longer than you planned. It is worth it!
reviews.title: 5th Visit to PRINX

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What you need in Amsterdam is a comfortable place to end your day after strolling or cycling around, or both. Everything is good at Prinx: the delicious bed, the furniture, the taste, the kitchen, the spacious room in general, the views, the silence, the owners, even the Spanish champagne (cava) in the fridge. We stayed for four days and never heard any other guests. It’s wonderfully located near the main museums and old canals, near very nice places to eat and drink, and near a few shops where you can buy good food. The only problem about a stay here is that it comes to an end: we have to come back!
reviews.title: Right what you need

reviews.text: We rented two rooms in mid September. One room had a canal view and the other had a street view. The canal view room was a little more expensive, but quite a bit larger with a larger kitchen and had a great view. Both rooms, however, were very tastefully decorated and the kitchens were equipped with all essentials for a comfortable stay. The location was fabulous! Close to everything, but still relatively quite (keep in mind you are in Amsterdam and there are lots of late night happenings). The Prinx is very convenient to several tram routes. Getting to Central Station and the Airport using trams and trains was very “doable.” Additionally, the neighborhood felt very safe. I would definitely stay at the Prinx again and would highly recommend it to anyone.
reviews.title: Great location, lovely rooms, super clean

reviews.text: L. Manwill
reviews.title: Excellent room and location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ton and Hector have a great place to stay.
reviews.title: Highly recommend

reviews.text: The apartment was great for our needs regarding self-catering. We discovered some really delicious places that allowed us to prepare cold and hot for all our meals.
reviews.title: My second stay at Prinx

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The accamodation is close to very tasty eating places, we tried some in a very touristy areas, but a must visit is the Albert Cuyp market, located about a fifteen minute walk from the apartment and the quality of the food was really fresh and inexpensive.
reviews.title: Superb location, fresh and creatively appointed rooms, friendly and helpful owners

reviews.text: The bed was large and comfortable. The studio apartment was light and comfortable and roomy. I would recommend this as a place to stay. Plan early to secure your place.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable and great location

reviews.text: The stairs are typical of Amsterdam housing so be prepared to clim rather steep stairs relative to what you get in Australia.
reviews.title: Home from home in Amsterdam

reviews.text: We just returned from our stay here. Everything the reviewers say -- is true and more.
reviews.title: You will not be disappointed

reviews.text: If you are fortunate enough to secure a reservation you will not be disappointed.
reviews.title: A Wonderful Stay at Prinx!

reviews.text: tom and Hector -- Thank you for being the most gracious hosts!
reviews.title: A second stay at PRINX

reviews.text: Loved:
reviews.title: Great room and facilties, great location and great owners

reviews.text: the refrigerator
reviews.title: Beautiful studio apartments

description: Situated within historical city centre in a canal house.Most attractions are within walking distance. The Museum Area (Rembrandt & van Gogh is just 50 meter away. You will be surrounded by typical historical houses and canals. The studios have been very recently renovated (2007). Besides your own private bathroom, each studio has a living-dining area -with cooking facilities- and a bed area. You will find sparkling wine cava (and orange juice) as welcome drink.
